title: Woman's blouse (Huipil)
description: Two panel huipil, with sleeves; ? blue field with red and blue striping, blue stripes checked by white squares; embroidered at shoulders and midsection; embroidered bands of leaf and lightening patterns of multiple colors;? gathered at neck.
